title: victorious skin
body: dunno if this is the right forum section, if its not, sorry bout that. Anyway, i was wondering, in order to get the victorious skin, do you have to get gold in solo/duo or ranked flex 5v5? or can you also get it from ranked 3v3?

replies.body: You should get the Victorious Skin from climbing to gold in any ranked queue. It doesn't matter if that queue is Summoners Rift or Twisted Treeline.
The ranked rewards for this season have yet to be announced; that being said, last season it was gold+ in any queue type.
